titleStmt.title: The honour of the taylors, or, The famous and renowned history of Sir John Hawkwood, Knight containing his many rare and singular adventures, witty exploits, heroick atchievements, and noble performances relating to love & arms in many lands : in the series of which history are contained likewise the no less famous actions and enterprizes of others of the same art and mystery : with many remarkable passages relating to customs, manners &c., ancient and modern : illustrated with pictures and embelished with verses and songs wonderfully pleasant and delightful : to which, as an appendix, is added a brief account of the original of the Worshipful Company of Merchant-Taylors, as to their being incorporated &c., ...
Honour of the Merchant Taylors
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

titleStmt.title: The honour of the taylors, or, The famous and renowned history of Sir John Hawkwood, Knight containing his many rare and singular adventures, witty exploits, heroick atchievements, and noble performances relating to love & arms in many lands : in the series of which history are contained likewise the no less famous actions and enterprizes of others of the same art and mystery : with many remarkable passages relating to customs, manners &c., ancient and modern : illustrated with pictures and embelished with verses and songs wonderfully pleasant and delightful : to which, as an appendix, is added a brief account of the original of the Worshipful Company of Merchant-Taylors, as to their being incorporated &c., ...
Honour of the Merchant Taylors
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Alexander Milbourn for William Whitwood ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption and running title: The renowned history of Sir John Hawkwood, Knight.
Written by William Winstanley. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
